H0.text: With what is FIFA usually associated. Soccer

H1.text: With what is FIFA usually associated. Sports

H2.text: With what is FIFA usually associated. International Competitions

H3.text: With what is FIFA usually associated. Footbal

A4.text: FIFA is the international governing body of association football, beach football, and futsal.

A5.text: FIFA organises major international tournaments such as the World Cup and Women's World Cup.

A6.text: FIFA organises international tournaments for youth football, club football, and football variants such as futsal and beach soccer.

A7.text: The FIFA World Cup is an international association football competition.

A8.text: Internationally, association football is governed by FIFA.

A9.text: FIFA was formed in Paris in 1904 as the international football body.
